name: SmiScnModel
brief:
Main scenario model class for stochastic linear/quadratic programming

SmiScnModel is the central class for representing and solving scenario-based
stochastic programs. It builds deterministic equivalent (DE) formulations
from scenario trees.

**Typical Usage:**
```cpp
SmiScnModel smi;
smi.readSmps("problem");              // Read SMPS files
smi.setOsiSolverHandle(new OsiClpSolverInterface());
OsiSolverInterface* osi = smi.loadOsiSolverData();  // Build DE
osi->initialSolve();                  // Solve extensive form
```

**Key Methods:**
- readSmps(): Parse SMPS files (core + time + stoch)
- generateScenario(): Add scenario with probability and branching info
- loadOsiSolverData(): Build deterministic equivalent LP
- getColSolution(scenario): Extract solution for specific scenario

**Solution Values:**
- solveWS(): Wait-and-See solution (perfect information)
- solveEV(): Expected Value solution (average scenario)
- solveEEV(): Expected result of using EV solution

**SmiScnNode Class:**
Represents a node in the scenario tree with:
- Stage index, probability, parent link
- Column/row offsets into DE matrix
- Link to SmiNodeData for LP data
